channel.title: Review on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in Review on Praveen Lobo

item.title: A Year That Was - 2010
item.description: Year 2010 was a totally different and a very special one for me. It all started in late 2009; from someone who used to talk so less and hardly socialize to wherever I am right now was quite a journey. I had a jolly good time and I wish it is one of the many years to come. 2010 had some downs, but I hardly remember them. The good ones are so many that I don’t have time to recall the bad ones.
